description:
Learn proven trading tactics without lots of fluff and wasted time. The same techniques that the instructor uses in his own trading. The focus is mastering the optimal entry and exit times.  My firm Global Capital Market Solutions (GCMS) is an independent capital markets education firm. We offer quality training globally. 

 Our proudest achievement has been the results of students, many have landed jobs or have increased their trading profitability. We assist individuals and financial institutions to get the most out of their investment for capital markets education and training. 

Our full diploma course, known for its hands - on approach has attracted a wide spectrum of attendees from Denmark, China, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom, Brazil, Poland, Austria, Switzerland, Germany, South Africa, Singapore, Hungary, Jamaica and the United States.
title: Forex trading tactics, that work!
